title: The compilation and installation of the p4est software update is faulty

I'm going to fix the bug in the p4est test source code, and p4est has changed the header in this link: https://github.com/cburstedde/libsc/commit/a89a00f0d23e62c1a8a31a96bf0a357bc504d357 . I follow the description in package.py. The URL of the version update has been changed, but I failed. Can you help me to find out how to solve the problem?
